data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ballerio, Alberto (2013): A remarkable new flightless Madrasostes Paulian, 1975 from Vietnam (Coleoptera Scarabaeoidea Hybosoridae Ceratocanthinae).
